entities.description: Indicates if the workplace tests employees for drug or alcohol use as part of the hiring process.
Indicates if the workplace tests employees for drug or alcohol use on a random basis.
Describes the workplace policy for the first time an employee tests positive for illicit drugs.
Indicates if the respondent is more or less likely to work for an employer that tests for drug use before hiring.
Indicates if the respondent is more or less likely to work for an employer that conducts random drug tests.

relationships.description: Relates to whether employees are tested for drug or alcohol use as part of the hiring process in the workplace.
Relates to whether the workplace conducts random drug or alcohol tests.
Defines the workplace's policy for handling the first time an employee tests positive for illicit drugs.
Indicates the respondent's likelihood of working for a company that conducts pre-hire drug tests.
Indicates the respondent's likelihood of working for a company that conducts random drug tests.
